name: originating
content:
Add to word list
Add to word list
present participle of
originate
C2 [ I ] to come from a particular place, time, situation, etc.: Although the technology originated in the UK, it has been developed in the US The game is thought to have originated among the native peoples of Alaska.
[ T ] to start something or cause it to happen: Who originated the saying "Small is beautiful"?
